page.title: 11Houses in Hurworth
page.content: Over half the houses in the village have been built since 1961 in large estates.Before this date the village had grown very slowly over hundreds of years.The modern estates are Friars Pardon, Emerson Road, Chase, Bacal, and Broseley in Hurworth and the Grange estate in Hurworth Place.I live on the Bacal estate at 10 Southfield Close.The Bacal estate consists of Greenfield Close, Westfield Drive, Emery Close, Hornby Close, Southfield Close, Dale Close, Bollyers Close, Brossfield Close, Sycamore Close and Malvern Close.Sometime in the future, houses are going to be built on the Strawfield.The Strawfield separates Emerson Road from the Bacal estate. Also houses are being built at the bottom of the school playground.
